= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *ACA.A1* || Primary Auditory Cortex || Main topotonic map, extract phonemes || Core, Brodmann area 41 ||
|| *ACA.A2* || Auditory Association Area || Classify with respect to function || Belt, Brodmann area 42 ||
|| *ACA.A3* || Wernicke's area A3 || Classify with respect to content || Brodmann Area 22, represent spoken words  ||
|| *ACA.A4* || Wernicke's area A4 || Coordinate the activation or deactivation of grammar areas || Brodmann Area 22, Grammatical areas ||
|| *ACA.STS* || Superior Temporal Sulcus || Parse stream into elements || A5 ||
